title: Efficient electrochemical water oxidation catalyzed by N4-coordinated nickel complexes under neutral condition
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00303A, Paper
Zhijun Ruan, Jinfeng Dong, Jieying Wang, Zhichao Qi, Xiaoli Chen, Xiangming Liang, Junqi Lin
Fine modulation of the ligand structure of metal complex-based homogeneous water oxidation catalysts is a feasible method to realize efficient electrochemical oxygen evolution. Herein, the synthesis and electrocatalytic water oxidation...
